data.title: Parcel Pick Up & Drop Off Points
data.meta_description: Find out about Evri ParcelShops, where you can send, collect and return your parcels. Book online and send or pick up in store. Open till late, 7 days a week.
data.text:
An Evri ParcelShop is where you can send, collect and return your parcels â with all the convenience of popping to your local corner shop.

Our ParcelShops are based in 8,500+ local businesses across the UK â and our network is growing. We also haveÂ 5,500+ Lockers, which you can use to send, collect and return parcels, 24/7. This makes them the ideal drop off point for your parcels.

Most of our ParcelShops have Print In ParcelShop devices â not only can youÂ print your parcel label in the shopÂ (if you've already booked online or with the Evri app), you can use the device to book and pay too. You just need to bring your parcel with you.

Many retailers offer you the option to have your item delivered to a ParcelShop â look out for Evri ParcelShops as a delivery option in online retailer checkouts.

You can also have items delivered to Lockers if thatâs more convenient. Both are ideal if youâre not sure if youâll be in, or donât have a safe place or neighbour to deliver to.
